Abstract:
The Terra MODIS Vegetation Continuous Fields (VCF) product is a sub-pixel-level representation of surface vegetation cover estimates globally.  Designed to continuously represent Earth’s terrestrial surface as a proportion of basic vegetation traits, it provides a gradation of three surface cover components: percent tree cover, percent non-tree cover, and percent bare.  VCF products provide a continuous, quantitative portrayal of land surface cover with improved spatial detail, and hence, are widely used in environmental modeling and monitoring applications.

The first generation of the VCF algorithm involved a semi-automated process to generate regression trees with machine learning software.  A human operator was required to evaluate the tree and decide if it needed more or less training data inputs.  The V003 VCF product is the first version from that generation, and only contains the percent tree cover layer, as does the current V005. The Version 051 released in winter of 2015 contains all 3 surface cover components. Generated yearly, the VCF product is produced using monthly composites of Terra MODIS 250 and 500 meters Land Surface Reflectance data, including all seven bands, and Land Surface Temperature.

Several reasons help explain the inter-annual fluctuations in the percentage of tree cover from year to year, and therefore, users should exercise caution when considering performing inter-annual comparisons of VCF.

The VCF products are validated to stage-1; this means that their product accuracy was estimated through an assessment of the training data’s accuracy, and from limited in situ field validation datasets.

V051 Data Set Characteristics: 
Area: ~10 degrees x 10 degrees lat/long 
Image Dimensions: 4800 x 4800 rows/columns 
File Size: 28 MB
Resolution: 250 meters 
Projection: Sinusoidal 
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS): 7

RelatedUrls.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
Interface to search, discover, and access EOS data products, and invoke available data services.
TLP DAAC Data Pool provides direct access to all currently available MODIS products and the ability to download them via HTTP.

The Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LP DAAC) is one of several discipline-specific data centers within the NASA Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS).  The LP DAAC Web page provides information about available data products, services, documentation, order interfaces, and tools.
various aspects of the land component of the MODIS mission.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid, which increases from left to right.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTBARE
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as non-vegetated

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTBROADLEAF
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as broadleaf forest

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTDECIDUOUS
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as deciduous forest

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTEVERGREEN
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as evergreen forest

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTOTHERHERBACEOUS
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as other herbaceous vegetation

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTNEEDLELEAF
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as needleleaf forest

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDCLOUD
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels under cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttributes.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTNONTREEVEGETATION
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as non-tree vegetation

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTSHRUBS
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as shrubs

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTCROPS
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as crops

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTICE
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as ice

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTBAREGROUND
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as bare ground

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PERCENTTREECOVER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels classified as tree cover

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttributes.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority

EntryTitle: MODIS/Terra Vegetation Continuous Fields Yearly L3 Global 500m SIN Grid V051
